backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, coin creation, balances, and orders with access control and helper functions for lookups and defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all main frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, themes, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, title, favicon, root div, and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app routing setup with authenticated layout, profile-setup gating, and main page routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Profile creation modal with username, display name, bio input, name confirmation, and error handling.
Layout wrapper providing navigation, user info, and logout handling with responsive UI.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBalances.t: React Query hook that fetches a user's token balance via the actor API.
Fetches an order book for a symbol and side with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Provides a mutation for placing orders and invalidates balance and order book caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: Hooks for fetching and mutating the caller's user profile with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context handling login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: UI page showing placeholder leaderboards and recent activity tables.
frontend/src/pages/CoinDetailPage.tsx: Displays a coin's order book and lets users place buy or sell orders with live data loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CoinsPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of user profiles and navigates to individual coin detail pages; currently uses placeholder data.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads and displays the logged-in user's profile, SQD balance, personal asset balance, and basic dashboard info.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing screen with login flow, redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard and showcasing features.
frontend/src/utils/assetSymbols.ts: Returns the asset symbol for a user, currently identical to their username.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state, existing features, and architectural notes for building the StonkSquad web app. Contains versioning, feature list, and guidance on UI language and asset usage.
